context: Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Cleaning,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
6 minutes ago
Dr. Nanda listens to the patients with keen ears and treats with great care. I went to clean my teeth post COVID and the clinic is pristine and safe. He takes all necessary precautions. He hears all the ailments and issues patiently and then suggests diagnosis and treatment. He patiently explained why the tooth grew in a certain way, why extraction is needed or not needed. *********  ******* * **** **** ** ** *** ****** ****** His treatment costs are also affordable. Please do check his clinic and get treated.

tags: None
review: I got my root canal treatment done by this doctor. initially was sacred about the treatment but then doctor Nanda Kumaran clearly explained the treatment properly in each and every single step from stating to finishing of my treatment and the doctor also called me after the treatment to check upon me.. after the root canal treatment cap was placed which had a warranty which i have not seen in any other clinics. thank you doctor.....
